hero.name: Brice Convers
hero.dive: Let's dive straight into my experience

about.description: Over the course of my studies, I have been exposed to a wide range of technologies and theoretical concepts, I have also applied my knowledge into practice through various projects. Currently in my final year of studies, I am looking for an internship in which I can further develop my skills and deepen my knowledge. Highly motivated and curious, I would like to challenge myself by carrying out my internship in the field of biomedical or in data science.

titles.subHead: What I have done so far
titles.head: Work Experience

points.0: I developed frontend elements for a metaverse project called Zexaland. For instance, I created a login component with metamask in javascript.
points.1: In addition, I improved backend's fonctionalities in this project, such as adding new routes or creating a virtual cursor in the Unity part.
points.2: I also helped to test and improve a significant project based on the detection of dashboard's car elements with image processing scripts.
points.3: Finally, I built a cash update system on a AWS S3 server in order to sync up all data of the dashboard images project.

1.title: Engineering Internship on Radar Airborne Algorithm

points.0: I worked on the improvement of airborne radar data processing algorithms.
points.1: I was using Matlab to work on data processing scripts.
points.2: This experience allows me to discover deeply data processing algorithms for airborne radar.
points.3: I also wrote some documentations and made team presentations.

points.0: I have been introduced to management and accounting skills. With this position, I could also participate to audits of the stucture.
points.1: I improved teamwork and participation skills with the attendance of business management training courses.

points.0: It was an mandatory internship for graduation.
points.1: I worked as a laborer in a plastic factory.

projects.description:
The following projects showcase my skills and experience through examples done during my free time. Each project is briefly described with
links to code repositories and live demos.

0.name: Deep Learning for Image Segmentation (Still in progress)
0.description: Creation of Semantic Segmentation Model for drone Images. This is a very important project for my final year of study, during which I have to segment images of drones. We use the UGA supercomputer called Gricad to train our models.

1.name: My Personal Portfolio 3D
1.description: A comprehensive personal portfolio platform that presents my projects, objectives and motivation.  I created this website during my free time.

2.name: Python Assembler Developement in C
2.description: Creation of a python assembler in the C language. I was project leader among a group of 3 students. Skills: Linux environment/ Git/ Refinement of C language skills.

3.name: Air Pollution Prediction
3.description: Prediction of air pollution through the implementation of different machine learning methods. We had at our disposal a training data set equivalent to measurements over several years. The aim was to measure also the accuracy of our predictions.

4.name: Cooking Social Network (Pending 50%)
4.description: Personal project where I created a small social network to share recipes with friends. The website is still in progress. I used NextJS in the project to manage the backend and frontend together.

5.name: Chess Game in C++ (Pending 90%)
5.description: This is a personal project where I coded a Chess Game in C++ with no graphical interface. The aim was to learn object-oriented programming.

titles.subHead: What I have completed so far
titles.head: Education

points.0: Major in Signal and Image processing, Communication systems, Multimedia (SICOM)
Intensive Japanese course to prepare for the official Japanese-Language Proficiency Test (JLPT).
In the Electrical and computer departement, I took part in the following courses:
I graduated with a bachelor's degree in automation. Subjects studied inlude:
points.1: Computer Science, Signal Processing Automation, Mechanics, Hydraulics

points.0: I took intensives courses in a preparatory class for the grandes écoles in order to enter a selective French university.

titles.subHead: What I have accomplished so far
titles.head: Highlights

0.testimonial: I did an international exchange in South Korea during 6 months at Postech University.
0.name: Postech, South Korea

1.testimonial: During my gap year I stayed one year in Japan. I attended intense Japanese Courses to pass the JLPT N3.
1.name: Yokohama, Japan

2.testimonial: I carried out an internship as a software development engineer at AX inc. I worked on the creation of a metaverse.
2.name: Tokyo, Japan
